Package display

Class CommandLineUtilities

java.lang.Object
display.CommandLineUtilities
public abstract class CommandLineUtilities extends Object
An abstract class that contains useful static methods for printing to the terminal. This class should be used by the command line display to display the game state in the CLI version.

  • Field Summary

      content - The content of the view.
      options - The options available in the view.

    • printOption

      public static void printOption(int i, String prefix, String text)
      Print an option line with the given index, prefix, and text.
      Parameters:
      i - the number of the current option
      prefix - the prefix to show for the option
      text - the main text of the option

    • printTeams

      public static void printTeams(ArrayList<Team> teams)
      Print all the teams in the given list. Each team is printed using the printTeam method.
      Parameters:
      teams - the teams to print

    • printTeam

      public static void printTeam(Team team)
      Print the given team by printing the team name followed by a table of the team champions.
      Parameters:
      team - the team to print

    • printChampionOptions

      public static void printChampionOptions(String prefix, ArrayList<Champion> champions)
      Print options for the list of champions using the given prefix. Each champion is printed as the prefix followed by the champion's name. The prefix is usually set to either "BUY" or "SELL".
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix to use
      champions - the list of champions to print

    • printWeaponOptions

      public static void printWeaponOptions(String prefix, ArrayList<Weapon> weapons)
      Print options for the list of weapons using the given prefix. Each weapon is printed as the prefix followed by the weapon's name. The prefix is usually set to either "BUY" or "SELL".
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix to use
      weapons - the list of weapons to print

    • printTeamOptions

      public static void printTeamOptions(ArrayList<Team> teams)
      Print a list of options for the given teams. Each team is followed by the prefix "FIGHT TEAM" to show that the player can fight this team by selecting this option.
      Parameters:
      teams - the list of teams to print
